brief_title: Named Patient Use Program to Provide Abemaciclib (LY2835219) for the Treatment of Metastatic Breast Cancer
inclusion_criteria:
inclusion criteria: 

 Patients with hormone receptor positive metastatic breast cancer for whom there is reasonable expectation that abemaciclib may provide clinical benefit and who are suitable to receive abemaciclib.
brief_summary: The treating physician/investigator contacts Lilly when, based on their medical opinion, a patient meets the criteria for inclusion in the expanded access program.
